channel.title: Need make my home not a wilderness spot
channel.description: Ok so i just made a fantastic home in a cool spot that is not in wilderness, then i realized that the wilderness was in the area (one of the wild patches on many servers... and i need to know how to remove the wilderness from my home.

item.title: Need make my home not a wilderness spot
item.dc:creator: @KillinXxSMile KillinXxSMile
item.description:
@KillinXxSMile wrote:

Next time explain it so he can understand…
…

First:
open your client.java and search for
public boolean nonWild() {

Underneath you should see something like:

        if ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)
                || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)
		|| (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)
                || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)
                || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)
                || heightLevel == 1) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    }

or yours may be all messy and look like:

        if ((absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) || (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) || heightLevel == 1) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    }

ok to be able to make your home area a safezone you will need the SW and NE coords of the area you want to make a safe zone.

You will then need to Fill in this

|| (absX >= #### && absX <= @@@@ && absY >= #### && absY <= @@@@)

change the #### with your SW coords
and the @@@@ with your NE coords
then add this before:
|| heightLevel == 1)

compile and run and your home should be safe…

Read full topic
item.source: Need make my home not a wilderness spot
